Text: Could you please re-seed Espionage self-titled 1983. Many thanks

"Lori & The Chameleons"! 
I've got that one on 7" somewhere. You dig up the most amazing stuff.
Thank you for this wonderful music.  I really appreciate it!

I gave my ex-wife a burned copy of your most recent new wave hits (volume 49) and she said, "that torrent guy sure knows what he is doing."  I have every single album you have ever uploaded and am in the process of creating a torrent server on freebsd.  I will keep you posted.  =)
nonsentence, that sounds great. Anything that can keep this 80s library for the others is highly appreciated.

Hi, I have built a linux server out of an old dual Pentium III motherboard with 4GB of memory and a 2TB external hard drive.  I intend on using this machine as my torrent server.  Is it enough for me to download a tracker for each mix/album and then point it to where they are saved?  I just realized that I took the individual albums out of their collection folders and have them listed separately.  Do I need to put them back in their collection folders?

nonsentence, if you have changed the structure of the torrent, when re-loaded it would be missing some files/folders. you have to preserve the structure/convert it to how it is in the original torrent.
Thank you.  I will make sure that is the case before I re-seed.

80zforever:

Re. your torrent "4 Rare 80s Albums [Part 78]" at http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5087351/4_Rare_80s_Albums_[Part_78]

Can you please tell me the source of the BB Gabor?
The artwork looks like a CD release, but I hear clicks and pops on the tracks which sounds more like a vinyl rip.

Thanks.

mapletor, it's from vinyl. The album however was released along with his 2nd lp on one CD called "And the Girls of the Future An Anthology" which is a bit hard to find and fetches crazy prices when sold on ebay. cheers
Interesting. I didn't know people would pay high prices for BB Gabor. Thanks.

I don't think that many people know him. It's just the collectors that pay high prices for these items. I am happy with the vinyl rip that's available, especially the second lp is not as good as the first.
